agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Urban Affairs TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Thursday, May 2, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Angie Button The Committee will meet to hear the following: HB 4750 Davis, Yvonne Relating to the creation of the Trinity Municipal Management District; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments and fees. HB 4755 Lopez Relating to the requirements for interlocal contracts. SB 1367 Buckingham Relating to use of project funds of municipal development districts. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
